pathAssistantSteps.info: Booking has been cancelled. A 'Cancellation Reason' is mandatory. Process any necessary refunds and ensure related support cases are closed. Note: Bookings cannot be cancelled if the start date has passed
•Booking is fully closed. All post-rental processes, including security deposit release and final invoicing, are complete. This booking is now archived for reporting purposes

Car has been returned. Verify condition, final mileage, and fuel level. Ensure all rental payments are finalized. If any outstanding charges exist (e.g., late return, damages), move to 'Returned (Awaiting Final Payment/Inspection)' if applicable, otherwise proceed to 'Closed
•Payment received, and booking confirmed. The car is now reserved for the customer. Verify all booking details are correct. No further discounts can be applied

Awaiting payment or confirmation. Ensure all details are accurate before processing payment. This is the only stage where a discount can be applied. Bookings without payment after 24 hours may be auto-cancelled
•Car has been picked up by the customer. Rental period is now active. The car's status is 'In Use'.
